name: Multi level menu. Prototype-ready!
description:
Add a working menu in your project. Duplicate the file and run the Demo page!


Features:


  • Menu item component (composite)
  • Submenu items component (composite)
  • Attached events: Click for navigating to other prototype screens, Mouse enter/leave for expanding/collapsing menus.
  • Instructions


PS: This is just a small kick-starter, demonstrating the mechanism. You can expand it as deep as your project requires.


Feel free to comment for bugs and improvements!
